external_games.name: Call of Duty League - Los Angeles Guerrillas Team Pack 2024

name: Call of Duty: League - Los Angeles Guerrillas Team Pack 2024
summary: Rep your favorite team with the 2024 Los Angeles Guerrillas Team Pack! The 2024 Pack includes Male and Female Home and Away Operator Skins, Camo, Charm, Vinyl Sticker, Animated Calling Card, Emblem and Sticker.
